trans-unit.source: Instances of this class are passed to a <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventHandler> method that is called when a <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A> call completes.
trans-unit.target: Le istanze di questa classe vengono passate a un <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventHandler>metodo che viene chiamato quando un <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A>completamento della chiamata.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A> methods send an Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) echo request asynchronously and wait for a corresponding ICMP echo reply message.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A>metodi inviare in modo asincrono una richiesta echo Internet controllo Message Protocol (ICMP) e attendere il messaggio di risposta echo ICMP corrispondente.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventArgs.Reply%2A> property contains the results of the ICMP echo request.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventArgs.Reply%2A>proprietà contiene i risultati della richiesta echo ICMP.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventArgs.Reply%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that contains data that describes an attempt to send an Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) echo request message and receive a corresponding ICMP echo reply message.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un oggetto che contiene dati che descrivono un tentativo di inviare un messaggio di richiesta echo Internet controllo Message Protocol (ICMP) e ricevere il messaggio di risposta echo ICMP corrispondente.

trans-unit.source: If the value of <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Status%2A> is not <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus>, you should not use the values that are returned by the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A>, <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A>, and <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Se il valore di <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Status%2A>non <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus>, i valori restituiti da non utilizzare il <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A>, <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A>, e <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Status%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A> and <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A> properties will return zero, and the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A> property will return `null`.
A <xref href="System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply"></xref> object that describes the results of the ICMP echo request.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply"> </xref> oggetto che descrive i risultati della richiesta echo ICMP.
